mapper.sql: INTER_ID, INTER_NAME, REMARK, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_inter_tb
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_inter_tb (INTER_ID, INTER_NAME, REMARK, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID) values (#{interId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{interName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ht_inter_tb
INTER_ID,
INTER_NAME,
REMARK,
OP_TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATOR_ID,
MODIFIER_ID,
#{interId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{interName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update ht_inter_tb
INTER_ID = #{record.interId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INTER_NAME = #{record.interName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_inter_tb set INTER_ID = #{record.interId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INTER_NAME = #{record.interName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_inter_tb
INTER_NAME = #{interName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = NOW(),
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INTER_ID = #{interId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ht_inter_tb set INTER_NAME = #{interName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INTER_ID = #{interId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.INTER_ID, A.INTER_NAME, A.REMARK FROM ht_inter_tb A LEFT JOIN ht_inter_field_tb B ON A.INTER_ID=B.INTER_ID WHERE A.INTER_NAME =#{tableName} AND B.DIM_CODE=#{dimCode} AND A.OP_TYPE!='D' AND B.OP_TYPE!='D'
